name: Append_Aggregates
description: This activity sequentially cycles through an array of flows given as pipeline's parameter. Each flow is invalidated.

command.value:
.append Aggregates <|
Aggregates
| where id == '@{item().id}'
| where isnull(valid)
| extend valid = false
| extend pipelineRun = strcat(pipelineRun, '_', '@{pipeline().RunId}')
